name: Christmas Cleaning
description:
Make your home cozy for the Christmas holidays by cleaning and decorating!

Godot Wild Jam #40 Entry

Theme: Cozy

Wildcard: Overworked

Known issues:

- The final background track (after decorating) is much louder than others.

 - The books can be hard to put on the shelf. Just try again if it's still blinking (move it out and back in).

 - The tree can be hard to put on the floor, sometimes it is necessary to move it away (all the way off the floor) before placing it back on the floor.
